original_title: IT’S IN THE GAME ‘17 or Mirror Gag for Vitrine and Protection
overview: Working primarily in digital media and installation, Sondra Perry’s interest lies in the relationship between identity and the digital realm; specifically in what she refers to as the “abstraction of subjecthood” that occurs in technologically-rendered images of blackness. Her work seeks to interrogate and elucidate the role of digital technology in the systematic oppression of black identities.
title: IT’S IN THE GAME ‘17 or Mirror Gag for Vitrine and Protection
